feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:05 a.m. PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Smoke, 12.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 10:00 AM MST Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Smoke
Temperature: 12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 10+

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Widespread smoke. Wind east 20 km/h. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late this evening. Local smoke. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 7 May 2023
